name: Vanilla Isometric Tiles
description:
Hi there! 

This is a set of tiles for the design of isometric video games or other pixel art project.

Each sprite is 32x32 and the sprite-sheet is 192x128. 

The compressed file contains 1 editable file for Aseprite and 10 color variations in .png port format for if you don't own Aseprite. 

The purpose is to be able to use them as a base for any design of isometric levels or only as a geometric design reference.
